      • selectContent

        public static boolean selectContent(ContentManager manager,
                                    javax.swing.JComponent contentComponent,
                                    boolean requestFocus)
        Searches through all simple and tabbed contents of the given ContentManager, and selects the one which holds the specified contentComponent.
        Returns:
        true if the necessary content was found (and thus selected) among content components of the given ContentManager.
